nodes.text: The Durillium Sea was a hyperspace quadrant in the Endor system.

The Durillium Sea was described as vast expanse of virtual nothingness. However, the quadrant was relatively safe for passing travelers and welcomed expansion. Nonetheless, the quadrant was inhabited by the Hutts, and questions were raised regarding whether or not the Empire would claim the area.

The Durillium Sea appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
